plot outline: The story is about Aadi, a sincere undercover police officer who is trying to fight the drug menace. During one of his missions he comes across Lakshmi, a beautiful girl filled with complexes. When Adi realizes he is in love, he finds out that Lakshmi is already married. How will Adi face this situation, who is Lakshmi, will Aadi and Lakshmi get together, forms the rest of the plot.
title: Aadi Lakshmi Puraana
plot: The story is about Aadi, a sincere undercover police officer who is trying to fight the drug menace. During one of his missions he comes across Lakshmi, a beautiful girl filled with complexes. When Adi realizes he is in love, he finds out that Lakshmi is already married. How will Adi face this situation, who is Lakshmi, will Aadi and Lakshmi get together, forms the rest of the plot.
